films.title: Manos: The Hands Of Fate
films.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

films.title: Catalina Caper
films.description: A group of swingin' teens take time out from having fun in the sun to try to foil a group of crooks searching for a stolen scroll.

films.title: Secret Agent Super Dragon
films.description: A series of murders in Michigan lead an American secret agent to Amsterdam, where he uncovers a plot to imperil the world with a potent new drug.

films.title: Village Of The Giants
films.description: Delinquent teen-agers ingest a substance and grow thirty feet tall, then proceed to take over a small town.
